it.uniud.mads.jlibbig.core.std

Class NodeChaser

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.uniud.mads.jlibbig.core.std.NodeChaser

  • public class NodeChaser
extends java.lang.Object
    Objects created from this class can be used to keep trace of nodes and their replicas.
